Employees.JobResponsibilities:
Got an opportunity to play with the new SAP products like SAP UI5, wave 1 of 25 Fiori apps, and SAP Mobile Platform 3.x.
Implemented UI5 and Fiori apps, worked on first S/4HANA implementation by an SAP Partner in Houston for Par Pacific Holdings.
Delivered end-to-end custom Fiori applications and SAP Store-certified hybrid solutions.

Achievements:
- Delivered DKOM'16 session on Fiori and S/4HANA.
- SAP SCN Member of the Month (Feb 2015).

Skills: SAP UI5 custom development, SMP, Mobile services, Fiori wave1, SAP HANA DB XS development, S4HANA Fiori Apps implementation.

SAP MDK product development and assurance activities and BTP Mobile services integration 
 SAP build Workzone implementation and integration 
 Fiori Apps development 
 SAP CAPM Prototyping 
 Website development for clients

Designed and developed custom Fiori/UI5 applications for Sydney Trains. Integrated features like image capture, network dropout handling, and file uploads.

Achievements:
- Deloitte Shout Out Award for defect resolution during Equip app implementation.

Managed desktop and mobile solutions for Transport for NSW, including over 15 Fiori/UI5 apps and hybrid/mobile applications. Led Mobility Roadmap projects and monthly releases.

Achievements:
- Delivered key milestones like SAP UI library upgrades and Mobility Roadmap development.
- Maintained stable operations for over 10,000 end-users.

Led UI5 library upgrades and enhanced time-sheeting solutions for SA Power Networks. Conducted an impact analysis for Fiori apps and HCM application upgrades.

Achievements:
- Enhanced time-sheeting solutions.
- Conducted successful UI5 library upgrades.

Designed and delivered offline mobility solutions for Military Planning and Operations at the Department of Defence. Focused on custom development and integration with SAP S/4HANA and SAP Mobile Platform.

Achievements:
- Developed an offline mobility solution for Military Planning and Operations.
- Implemented OData services using MAIF, enhancing data synchronization performance.
